title: Replace FUNDGROWTH site logo with uploaded logo.png

requirements.text: Replace the existing FUNDGROWTH logo asset at /assets/generated/fundgrowth-logo.dim_512x192.png with the user-uploaded image file logo.png, and ensure all places that render the current logo show the updated image (including the header, footer, and marketing pages).
acceptanceCriteria: The static asset file frontend/public/assets/generated/fundgrowth-logo.dim_512x192.png is updated to match the uploaded logo.png (no additional backend routing).
Site header renders the updated logo via src="/assets/generated/fundgrowth-logo.dim_512x192.png" and it is visible on all pages where the header appears.
Site footer renders the updated logo via src="/assets/generated/fundgrowth-logo.dim_512x192.png" and it is visible on all pages where the footer appears.
When deployed, the logo served at https://fundgrowth-7y2.caffeine.xyz/assets/generated/fundgrowth-logo.dim_512x192.png shows the updated image.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Keep all user-facing text in English.
nonGoals: Do not change any other branding assets or illustrations besides the logo.
Do not change the appâ€™s color theme, layout, routes, or backend logic as part of this request.

edits: Replace the logo with the uploaded image (fundgrowth-logo.dim_512x192.png > fundgrowth-logo.dim_512x192.png)
